word_mean: 转移：将疾病从一个器官或部分转移到与其无直接联系的另一部位，可为致病性微生物(例如结核杆菌)或细胞(例如恶性肿瘤)的转移
转移能力是所有恶性肿瘤的特征
〔复metastases〕转移灶：致病性微生物或异常细胞又生长于远离原发病变的部位

sentence.Network_en: Approximately one third of all patients with malignant disease have hepatic metastasis.

sentence.Network_en: They are growing slowly with a propensity for local recurrence and metastasis.
sentence.Network_cn: 肿瘤本身特性为缓慢变大,具有局部再发和转移现象.

sentence.Network_cn: 结论: 罗勒多糖通过多个药效靶点 抗肿瘤 增殖及转移.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (as a rhetorical term, meaning 'rapid transition from one point to another'): from Greek, literally removal or change', from methistanai 'to change'

means.word_mean: 1. the spreading of a disease to another part of the body
2. the organic processes (in a cell or organism) that are necessary for life
